title: On the $AdS_3$ Virasoro-Shapiro Amplitude
authors: Luis F. Alday, Gaston Giribet, Tobias Hansen
abstract:
We consider tree-level scattering amplitudes for four string tachyons on
$AdS_3 \times {\cal N}$ with pure NSNS fluxes. We show that in a small
curvature expansion, properly defined, the amplitudes take the form of a genus
zero integral given by the Virasoro-Shapiro integrand with the extra insertion
of single valued multiple polylogarithms. This is the same structure as the one
found for the AdS Virasoro-Shapiro amplitude in higher dimensions.
